decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | The appearance, installation, joinery and finish of the replacement windows shall match exactly the existing windows in all respects including cross sections of sills, glazing bars, transoms, mullions and frames and colour.  REASON:   To protect the character of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policies B1, B24 and Replacement UDP Policy 4.8. | The glazing bars for the new French doors shall be the same narrow type as for the windows, and the panes should also be of equal size to the windows, as shown in the drawings provided.  REASON:   To protect the character of the Brentham Garden Estate Conservation Area, in accordance with Adopted Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Policy B24 and Replacement UDP Policy 4.8.
description: Replacement of all windows and installation of French doors and windows to ground floor rear elevation
